11.14.18  10:17 am   Can people learn to be musical?

     it happens while doing it

11.14.18  10:02 am   Hello, do you have any advice for learning different keys for piano (A, Bb, etc...) I am pretty much self taught, but i struggle with learning keys.

     you'll have to take some songs you know already and then play them in the next key. if it's in C, and you know it in C, try learning it in F. if you are having trouble figuring out what key the song you know is in, ..... try very simple songs ? like the alphabet song for example, if you play that in C the first 2 notes are C. that would be in the key of C. that doesn't mean every song starts on the note of the key it's in, but some songs do .... i think you should start by learning a lot of simple songs in the key of C. i think you will get used to it ... it's kind of like learning which wall of a room is the floor ... there's no rule but you can usually get a feel for it. then once you know a bunch of songs in C then start learning all those songs in F. it should look exactly the same except you will have to swap in 1 black note to make it sound right. get used to that and then you can go to the next key (Bb) in which you will have to swap in 1 more black note. or, go backwards, back to C, then go the other way to the next key (G), in which case you will have to swap in a a different black note the other way. if you go through the keys this way (C, F, Bb, Eb) it will be only 1 slight twist each time and you should learn it fine. or going the other direction it's C, G, D, A, etc

11.14.18  9:47 am   Hey Bill. Your last two songs felt really weird... Musically and lyrics wise. My favorite piece from you is "hello sexy pants". It's catchy, it's motivational, with little bits of commentary and humor here and there. It's genius. I'd love to see more songs like it.

     i think the closes thing i have done to sexy pants was probably 'slow down', and that was probably way too similar. need to be way way way way more different. difficult when it is just me doing everything but i will keep trying

11.14.18  9:28 am   do u ever get annoyed at the comments that r like "this guy must be on drugs lol" or just like, commenters in general crediting your creativity to something that isn't entirely you. if that makes sense 

     no but what is slightly annoying is when people ask quesitons that start with 'does it annoy you...' because it looks as if they are trying to remind me of things they think will be annoying to me

11.14.18  8:48 am   how do you make these vehicles? wait no i meant songs

     i will explain it soon

11.14.18  8:24 am   You've been on the internet for a long time, but decided to get into social media quite recently (joined YouTube only in 2013). What led you to expand your content like this, and so long after joining the internet?

     i mostly did not start posting anything online at all until 2014. was scared i guess, wanted to experiment more first. i did however, use the internet for various things (browsing, surfing the web, etc) since well before 2014

11.14.18  8:19 am   r u hyped

     yes

11.14.18  8:16 am   hey bill! is there a way to remember/memorise music notes so that when I can play the piano it will be easier? I always find myself staggering whenever its one note than another

     just spend more time playing notes and seeing what they sound like, relative to each other. the more time you spend playing i think the more you will learn

11.14.18  8:11 am   do you plan to sell pullovers, too? i'd like to spend some money for your merch but it's already too cold for t-shirts

     making clothing is something i do not know how to do and it might be cool but it is not something i have any experience doing and it is not something i ever plan to do. i do however plan to make many many songs of audio and visual content, as well as many other types of audio/visual and textual content, both written and improvised, and much more

11.14.18  8:03 am   Hey bill, loved the new song. There were definitely bits that sounded similar to long long long journey and it felt a lot less structured. Did you do this on purpose? Nevertheless, thanks for making it :)

     if it sounded similar to another song that would be not on purpose, and i try to avoid that happening as much as i can. as for structure i think i tried to avoid structure because with that type of song it so easily falls into AABA etc form, and if you're not careful it will just flip back and forth between the 2 sections, and in that song the sections are reasonably short and the B sec is longer than the A so you if you have just 1 A you'll get tired of the B. ultimately i think the song is probably too structured but it came out ok, the ending vamp helped because it's different

11.14.18  7:39 am   How would you describe your childhood?

     childy

     it's something i think everyone can relate to

11.14.18  4:02 am   what is your life story?

     fell down the rabbit hole then fell into it again so i guess the first time i didn't really fall in but the second time i am pretty sure i did

11.14.18  3:50 am   Today i was late for school because your newest song told me to slow down. Should i stop trusting your songs?

     maybe, they contain a lot of fictional content, with truths mixed in also

11.14.18  2:55 am   What key is the beginning of slow down in because I think it is unlike your other songs and I love it! It also calmed me down, thank you!

     if you are talking about the first 2 seconds, that is not really in any key, it sort of jumps rapidly to 5 different keys, and it is actually quite similar to a lot of instrumental bits i may have done in videos in around 2015. but i am skeptical that that's the part you are referring to, because it seems very un-calm. but if you are talking about the next 10 seconds after that, that would be in F with the rest of the song

11.13.18  11:07 pm   how to keep deadline without cheats. thanks

11.13.18  11:06 pm   how do you feel about abbreviating "I am going to" as "finna"?

11.13.18  10:45 pm   Give a very quick music lesson 

     ok

11.13.18  10:38 pm   why is ur hat bent

     due to style

11.13.18  10:22 pm   was the way you made the song feel like the song starts 1.5 times faster than it actually is a subconscious way to get us to feel like the song's already slowed down?

     possibly

     also what in the world would you even parse that intro in? like 5 quarter note triplets, so you might even write it as 5/6, irrationally? come on

     it would have to be a completely different tempo than the rest of the song. it doesn't line up with anything. when i was recording other parts for the verse, after the pre-intro was done, i really had to turn the click on and completely ignore the pre-intro. i can tell you it does not line up properly unless you call it a tempo change on paper. actually there is a further complication because after it ends there's still 1 swung 16th note going into the next part, because the landing point is essentially the "a" of 4 so to speak

11.13.18  10:16 pm   the rhythms in slow down are infectious. at the start, just due to the way you arranged it, it sounds so much like the word 'time' falls on beat 1, buts its actually beat 2, as proven by the 2nd time you come around to that verse. i was so convinced 'time' was beat 1 that i thought you threw in a 7/4 as the first measure of the actual tune. did you intend this mindfuckery

     it didn't occur to me that that could happen, but now that you mention it i can see why it could sound that way

11.13.18  10:14 pm   tennor saxophone or alto?

     can't see it, did u forget to attach

11.13.18  10:07 pm   do you have plans on making another long video

     yes but hopefully a reasonable enough length that it is possible to complete during my life time

11.13.18  10:06 pm   I feel Slow Down talks about that feeling of pressure when a deadline is coming. And not even a proper deadline, maybe some deadline you have inside your head, like "i'm good enough, I should be able to finish this by tomorrow". That sort of feeling. You should slow down and take of yourself, stop and think what you really feel and what you really want to do. Is this the case with the song?

     no

     Towards the end I got the feeling of doing something because someone asked. In this case, writing a song about how that special someone is always there for you, in this case the "special someone" is the client, and we could easil interpret the client as the audience who pay to listen to music. Is this how you feel about the music business?

     not quite

      I apologise for the amount of questions, I just feel you're really authentic but the lack of wanting to explicitly tell what you're feeling is keeping me from really understand where you're coming from.

     that is what keeps you hopefully coming back for more

     But the thing with music is that... that's alright. It's not always about understanding. Sometimes you just gotta think and deduct. And that is what I'm doing right now. So it's fun, in a certain way, and I hope you're having fun with this question. I just wish you the best because you've always kept yourself honest and fought throughout the uncomfortableness. Love to you and your loved ones.

11.13.18  10:03 pm   do you first write the song and then come up with a video for it

     yes

      or when you write you already think of the visuals?

     sometimes

      will you ever live stream?

     i hope so

      love u

11.13.18  9:50 pm   What is your songwriting process?

     i just have to come up with something, and then i have to figure out if it's the beginning or not. and if it's the beginning, then i have to figure out what comes next, and if it's not the beginning then i need to figure out what comes first, and then what comes next

      Do you generally look for a theme

     yes

      or is it just sporadic and totally you? 

     yes

11.13.18  9:44 pm   how to stop thinking about the fact that death is inevitable

     start thinking about the inevitability of life

     the haters will never find this page

11.13.18  9:30 pm   What do you think about absurdist philosophy? 

     often not as absurd as advertised

11.13.18  9:23 pm   How about trying to make a song without using "and"﻿

     i'm pleased to announce i will never use it again
